lines.i: The EMS personnel's impression of the patient's primary problem or most significant condition

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.65"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10796)/@code="67492-9" Primary problem NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10797)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10798), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:10799)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.11
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10796)/@code="67492-9" Primary problem NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10797)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10798), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM) (CONF:10799)
NEMSIS Trace: ESituation.11
